import React from 'react' import logo from './images/logo.svg' import { FaBars } from 'react-icons/fa' // context provider code import { useGlobalContext } from './context' const Navbar = () => { // show/hide context functions const { openSidebar, openSubmenu, closeSubmenu } = useGlobalContext() // submenu functions const displaySubmenu = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log('open!') openSubmenu() } const removeSubmenu = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log('closed!') closeSubmenu() } return (
) } export default Navbar
